listings.name: Fire & Frost Wood Fired Bakehouse
listings.description: Artisan wood-fired bread bakery featuring European-style breads, pastries, and baked goods. Authentic sourdough, rustic loaves, and seasonal specialties. Cafe with coffee and light fare.

listings.name: Three Notch'd Brewery
listings.description: Craft brewery with rotating selection of beers and full kitchen. Comfortable taproom atmosphere with outdoor patio. Known for flagship IPAs and seasonal brews. Family-friendly.

listings.name: Pharsalia
listings.description: Working farm and educational center offering farm tours, workshops, and seasonal events. Visit the farm store for locally-raised grass-fed beef, pastured pork, and farm-fresh eggs. Popular destination for school field trips and agritourism. Beautiful historic property with walking trails and picnic areas.

listings.name: Swannanoa Palace
listings.description: Historic Italian Renaissance-style marble mansion built in 1912 atop Afton Mountain. Offers guided tours showcasing Tiffany stained glass windows, marble columns, and panoramic mountain views. Rich history includes its time as a country club and art school. Perfect for architecture enthusiasts and history buffs.

listings.name: Lovingston Winery
listings.description: Boutique winery producing premium Virginia wines with estate-grown grapes. Intimate tasting experiences and beautiful vineyard views. Wine and cheese pairings available. Event space for private gatherings.

listings.name: Hill Top Winery & Meadery
listings.description: Winery and meadery specializing in honey wines and traditional grape wines. Unique offerings combining Virginia grapes and local honey. Tasting room with mountain views and educational experiences.

listings.name: Flying Fox Vineyards
listings.description: Small family-owned vineyard producing elegant Virginia wines. Intimate tastings and vineyard tours. Beautiful setting with mountain views. Known for Viognier and Cabernet Franc.

listings.name: Mountain Cove Vineyards
listings.description: Scenic vineyard offering wine tastings in a relaxed atmosphere. Estate wines and beautiful mountain setting. Picnic areas available. Perfect for wine lovers seeking authentic Virginia wine experiences.

listings.name: Brent Manor Vineyards
listings.description: Family-owned winery producing premium Virginia wines. Estate-grown grapes and traditional winemaking techniques. Tasting room and outdoor pavilion with scenic views.

listings.name: Valley Road Vineyards
listings.description: Boutique winery offering handcrafted Virginia wines. Small production focusing on quality over quantity. Intimate tasting experiences and beautiful vineyard setting.

listings.name: Wild Wolf Brewing Company
listings.description: Craft brewery with full kitchen, outdoor patio, and kid-friendly atmosphere. Known for creative seasonal beers and live music on weekends. Community gathering spot.
